yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
huwa alladhī baʿatha fī al-umiyīna rasūlan min'hum yatlū ʿalayhim āyātihi wayuzakkīhim wayuʿallimuhumu al-kitāba wal-ḥik'mata wa-in kānū min qablu lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
waākharīna min'hum lammā yalḥaqū bihim wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
mathalu alladhīna ḥummilū al-tawrāta thumma lam yaḥmilūhā kamathali al-ḥimāri yaḥmilu asfāran bi'sa mathalu al-qawmi alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
qul yāayyuhā alladhīna hādū in zaʿamtum annakum awliyāu lillahi min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
walā yatamannawnahu abadan bimā qaddamat aydīhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun bil-ẓālimīna
qul inna al-mawta alladhī tafirrūna min'hu fa-innahu mulāqīkum thumma turaddūna ilā ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā nūdiya lilṣṣalati min yawmi al-jumuʿati fa-is'ʿaw ilā dhik'ri al-lahi wadharū al-bayʿa dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
fa-idhā quḍiyati al-ṣalatu fa-intashirū fī al-arḍi wa-ib'taghū min faḍli al-lahi wa-udh'kurū al-laha kathīran laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
wa-idhā ra-aw tijāratan aw lahwan infaḍḍū ilayhā watarakūka qāiman qul mā ʿinda al-lahi khayrun mina al-lahwi wamina al-tijārati wal-lahu khayru al-rāziqīna
